net.floodlightcontroller.core

接口 IOFSwitchListener

  • 所有已知实现类:
    DHCPSwitchFlowSetter, Forwarding, LinkDiscoveryManager, LinkDiscoveryManagerTest.TestLinkDiscoveryManager, StaticFlowEntryPusher, TestModule

    public interface IOFSwitchListener
    Switch lifecycle notifications. These updates /happen-after/ the corresponding changes have been committed. I.e., the changes are visible when IFloodlightProviderService#getSwitch(long) IFloodlightProviderService#getAllSwitchDpids() IFloodlightProviderService#getAllSwitchMap() or any method on the IOFSwitch returned by these methods are called from the notification method or after it. Note however, that additional changes could have been committed before the notification for which the notification is still pending. E.g., IFloodlightProviderService#getSwitch(long) might return null after a switchAdded() (which happens if the switch has been added and then removed and the remove hasn't been dispatched yet). These lifecycle notification methods are called by a single thread and they will always be called by the same thread. The calls are always in order.

    • 方法概要

      方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      void switchActivated(org.projectfloodlight.openflow.types.DatapathId switchId)
      Fired when a switch becomes active *on the local controller*, I.e., the switch is connected to the local controller and is in MASTER mode
      void switchAdded(org.projectfloodlight.openflow.types.DatapathId switchId)
      Fired when switch becomes known to the controller cluster.
      void switchChanged(org.projectfloodlight.openflow.types.DatapathId switchId)
      Fired when any non-port related information (e.g., attributes, features) change after a switchAdded TODO: currently unused

      Fired when a port on a known switch changes.
      void switchRemoved(org.projectfloodlight.openflow.types.DatapathId switchId)

    • 方法详细资料

      • switchAdded

        void switchAdded(org.projectfloodlight.openflow.types.DatapathId switchId)
        Fired when switch becomes known to the controller cluster. I.e., the switch is connected at some controller in the cluster
        参数:
        switchId - the datapath Id of the new switch

      • switchRemoved

        void switchRemoved(org.projectfloodlight.openflow.types.DatapathId switchId)
        Fired when a switch disconnects from the cluster ,
        参数:
        switchId - the datapath Id of the switch

      • switchActivated

        void switchActivated(org.projectfloodlight.openflow.types.DatapathId switchId)
        Fired when a switch becomes active *on the local controller*, I.e., the switch is connected to the local controller and is in MASTER mode
        参数:
        switchId - the datapath Id of the switch

      • switchPortChanged

        void switchPortChanged(org.projectfloodlight.openflow.types.DatapathId switchId,
                     org.projectfloodlight.openflow.protocol.OFPortDesc port,
                     PortChangeType type)
        Fired when a port on a known switch changes. A user of this notification needs to take care if the port and type information is used directly and if the collection of ports has been queried as well. This notification will only be dispatched after the the port changes have been committed to the IOFSwitch instance. However, if a user has previously called IOFSwitch.getPorts() or related method a subsequent update might already be present in the information returned by getPorts.
        参数:
        switchId -
        port -
        type -

        参数:
        switchId -
